comments:
I was moving from RC2 to i0617 and got the following stack trace on startup of 
my pre-existing workspace.  Eclipse *appeared* to hang.  On inspecing the stack 
trace I saw that it was doing some error dialog so I started closing various 
windows I had open.  Eventually I got to an error dialog saying that the 
workspace layout would have to be reset.  I clicked OK and it the restart 
succeeded (though the layout was reset).

It turns out that if it has something to do with a perspective I have defined.  
If I shutdown my workpsace with the resources perspective open, it starts ok.  
If I open "my" perspective and exit, on restart I get the same error every time.

I got this error too when starting I20040617 - 1626.

All of my perspective states were lost. I ended up with a single resource
perspective open. On shutdown, I had a Java and Team Synchronizing perspective
open. Increasing severity.

my perspective which has no visibile views (all are detached and not open by 
default).  If there is no editor open it fails.  If there is an edtiro open it 
seems to work

John, is the stack trace you saw the same?
The one Kim and I were looking at is different.

Actually, I lied a little .  The trace I pasted in here was the first one I 
got.  After resting my layout I opened a new copy of my perspective, exited and 
restarted and continue to get

This appears to be an upgrade case -- the problem is only (and always) hit when
going from a workspace created with an earlier build to I20040617-16??.
